title: Learning Together

questions.text: When it comes to learning new things, I prefer to...
choices: Dive in and figure it out
Take my time and go at my own pace

questions.text: Something I'd love for us to learn together is...
choices: Something practical for our life together

questions.text: When I'm struggling to learn something, I need...
choices: Space to work through it myself
Help breaking it into smaller steps

questions.text: What motivates me most to keep learning?
choices: Becoming better at what I do

questions.text: The most valuable thing I've learned from our relationship is...
choices: How to love and be loved

description: Discover how you approach learning and growth as a team.
